name: Atonio Ganilau
story: Atonio grew up on the island of Martinique, where he learned to navigate the waters and evade authorities. He turned to smuggling as a way to make a living, and now works for the INDEPENDENT faction delivering illicit goods across the Mediterranean. Despite his young age, he has become an expert in his trade and is known for his daring escapades and ability to get past checkpoints undetected.
